CustomField.description: This field calculates the values in same way as done for CriticalZoneValueForApps field. All appointments which are scheduled within calculated offset from Allowed Appointment Start time are considered in Safe Zone. i.e. If the offset value calculated is X mins, then all appointments starting in X minutes from their Appointment start time are considered as safe.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field calculates the values in same way as done for CriticalZoneValueForApps field. All appointments which are scheduled within calculated offset from Allowed Appointment Start time are considered in Safe Zone.
CustomField.label: Safe Zone Value For Appointments
